Package jpen

Main classes for JPen client applications and PenProviders.

Interface Summary
PenDevice  
PenProvider A PenProvider contains and maintains a collection of PenDevices which access a pointer (pen tablet/mouse or similar) data source using an specific method (e.g.
PenProvider.Constructor Each PenProvider is constructed using a Constructor.

PenProvider.ConstructionException A condition which prevented the PenProvider from being constructed on the PenProvider.Constructor.construct(PenManager) method call.
